__e: You told me to bond with her, so I bonded.
Doesn't he know that you told me to leave?
Look, you asked me to leave, I'll leave.
You asked me to tell you what happened... and that's exactly what happened.
You asked me to spit it out, so I spit it out.
You asked me to do you a favor, which I gladly did, and now you want to shut me out?
Is that when you asked her to come to your house?
No... that detective... he's done everything you've asked him to do, so just tell him that it is a mistake.
Pretty much what you did the moment you asked him to go into business with you.
I wondered if you asked his name so that he could become a person to you.
Why didn't you get the money before you had sex with him?
Why didn't you ask us for the money?
I gave you a job to do, and you promptly asked for a seat at the table.
He told me that your mother is dying and that you need to go home.
No, I'm here only because you asked.
And that's why you asked your brother for help.
The truth is, when you asked me for help, it wasn't a great morning for me to be thinking about that kind of thing.
And why you didn't ask me to help, well, that's your business, but there's only one reason to raise an army, Jack, and that's because we're at war.
You borrowed 50K from a very dangerous man after he was already going to kill you.
- But now-- - That's why you asked me and not these other people,
No more than you've asked of me.
I'll even give you something you didn't ask for... An apology.
No, um, you told me to name an idea, and so I named one.
You asked me once before, I said no before.
